hero.name: Anisa
hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.subtitle: I create innovative web applications with modern technologies

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with extensive experience building scalable web and mobile applications. My expertise spans across modern JavaScript frameworks including React.js, Next.js, and Vue.js, complemented by strong TypeScript proficiency for type-safe development.
about.description_2: I bring strong DevOps and cloud expertise through CI/CD pipelines, Firebase integration, and cloud infrastructure management. Recently completed AI Prompt Engineering certification, gaining expertise in prompt optimization, RAG systems, AI agents, and working with Hugging Face models and embeddings.
about.philosophy: I firmly believe that in today's rapidly evolving tech landscape, it's possible to learn any stack or technology. This adaptability mindset, combined with my AI engineering skills, drives my approach to building intelligent, modern applications.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Creating responsive and interactive user interfaces with modern frameworks

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Building scalable APIs and server-side applications with robust architecture

problemsolving.title: Problem Solving
problemsolving.description: Analyzing complex challenges and implementing efficient solutions

projects.title: My Side Projects
projects.subtitle: Personal projects I've built to explore new technologies and solve interesting problems

kanban.title: Kanban Board
kanban.description: A task management application with reusable components that allows users to manage tasks visually using a board with columns representing different stages of task completion.

chat.title: Chat App
chat.description: A real-time chat application built with WebSockets, featuring participant rooms and offline support for seamless communication.

qaigen.title: QAIGen
qaigen.description: An AI-powered application that converts requirements into comprehensive test cases and automated tests, streamlining the testing process with intelligent test generation capabilities.

ai-builder.title: AI Builder
ai-builder.description: This application allows users to create websites and applications based on descriptions using AI. It leverages advanced AI agents and code generation to transform natural language requirements into functional web solutions.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's work together!
